text: Schwarzenberg (German pronunciation: [ʃvaɐ̯t͡sənbɛɐ̯k]) is a town in the rural district of Erzgebirgskreis in Saxony, Germany. The town was built in the 12th century. It is located about southeast of Aue, and southwest of Chemnitz. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Erzgebirgskreis Rural District
title: Schwarzenberg, Saxony
